title: Biden has decided on his U.S. Supreme Court choice -source
description: U.S. President Joe Biden has decided on his choice for the U.S. Supreme Court, a person familiar with the process said on Thursday.
content:
WASHINGTON, Feb 24 (Reuters) - U.S. President Joe Biden has decided on his choice for the U.S. Supreme Court, a person familiar with the process said on Thursday.
The person did not name the nomineeâ€¦ [+996 chars]
